ACM.1.Title: ACM certificates should be renewed after a specified time period

APIGateway.1.Title: API Gateway REST and WebSocket API execution logging should be enabled

APIGateway.2.Title: API Gateway REST API stages should be configured to use SSL certificates for backend authentication

APIGateway.3.Title: API Gateway REST API stages should have AWS X-Ray tracing enabled

AutoScaling.1.Title: Auto scaling groups associated with a load balancer should use load balancer health checks

CloudFront.1.Title: CloudFront distributions should have a default root object configured

CloudFront.2.Title: CloudFront distributions should have origin access identity enabled

CloudFront.3.Title: CloudFront distributions should require encryption in transit

CloudFront.4.Title: CloudFront distributions should have origin failover configured

CloudTrail.1.Title: CloudTrail should be enabled and configured with at least one multi-region trail

CloudTrail.2.Title: CloudTrail should have encryption at-rest enabled

CloudTrail.4.Title: CloudTrail log file validation should be enabled

CloudTrail.5.Title: CloudTrail trails should be integrated with Amazon CloudWatch Logs

CodeBuild.1.Title: CodeBuild GitHub or Bitbucket source repository URLs should use OAuth

CodeBuild.2.Title: CodeBuild project environment variables should not contain clear text credentials

DMS.1.Title: Database Migration Service replication instances should not be public

DynamoDB.1.Title: DynamoDB tables should automatically scale capacity with demand

DynamoDB.2.Title: DynamoDB tables should have point-in-time recovery enabled

DynamoDB.3.Title: DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) clusters should be encrypted at rest

EC2.1.Title: EBS snapshots should not be public, determined by the ability to be restorable by anyone

EC2.10.Title: Amazon EC2 should be configured to use VPC endpoints

EC2.15.Title: EC2 subnets should not automatically assign public IP addresses

EC2.16.Title: Unused Network Access Control Lists should be removed

EC2.2.Title: The VPC default security group should not allow inbound and outbound traffic

EC2.3.Title: Attached EBS volumes should be encrypted at-rest

EC2.4.Title: Stopped EC2 instances should be removed after a specified time period

EC2.6.Title: VPC flow logging should be enabled in all VPCs

EC2.7.Title: EBS default encryption should be enabled

EC2.8.Title: EC2 instances should use Instance Metadata Service Version 2 (IMDSv2)

EC2.9.Title: EC2 instances should not have a public IPv4 address

EFS.1.Title: Elastic File System should be configured to encrypt file data at-rest using AWS KMS

EFS.2.Title: Amazon EFS volumes should be in backup plans

ELB.3.Title: Classic Load Balancer listeners should be configured with HTTPS or TLS termination

ELB.4.Title: Application load balancer should be configured to drop http headers

ELB.5.Title: Application and Classic Load Balancers logging should be enabled

ELB.6.Title: Application Load Balancer deletion protection should be enabled

ELBv2.1.Title: Application Load Balancer should be configured to redirect all HTTP requests to HTTPS

EMR.1.Title: Amazon Elastic MapReduce cluster master nodes should not have public IP addresses

ES.1.Title: Elasticsearch domains should have encryption at-rest enabled

ES.2.Title: Amazon Elasticsearch Service domains should be in a VPC

ES.3.Title: Amazon Elasticsearch domains should encrypt data sent between nodes

ElasticBeanstalk.1.Title: Elastic Beanstalk environments should have enhanced health reporting enabled

ElasticBeanstalk.2.Title: Elastic Beanstalk managed platform updates should be enabled

IAM.1.Title: IAM policies should not allow full "*" administrative privileges

IAM.2.Title: IAM users should not have IAM policies attached

IAM.3.Title: IAM users' access keys should be rotated every 90 days or less

IAM.4.Title: IAM root user access key should not exist

IAM.5.Title: MFA should be enabled for all IAM users that have a console password

IAM.6.Title: Hardware MFA should be enabled for the root user

IAM.7.Title: Password policies for IAM users should have strong configurations

IAM.8.Title: Unused IAM user credentials should be removed

KMS.1.Title: IAM customer managed policies should not allow decryption actions on all KMS keys

KMS.2.Title: IAM principals should not have IAM inline policies that allow decryption actions on all KMS keys

KMS.3.Title: AWS KMS keys should not be deleted unintentionally

Lambda.1.Title: Lambda function policies should prohibit public access

Lambda.2.Title: Lambda functions should use supported runtimes

Lambda.4.Title: Lambda functions should have a dead-letter queue configured

RDS.10.Title: IAM authentication should be configured for RDS instances

RDS.12.Title: IAM authentication should be configured for RDS clusters

RDS.13.Title: RDS automatic minor version upgrades should be enabled

RDS.14.Title: Amazon Aurora clusters should have backtracking enabled

RDS.2.Title: RDS DB Instances should prohibit public access, determined by the PubliclyAccessible configuration

RDS.3.Title: RDS DB instances should have encryption at-rest enabled

RDS.4.Title: RDS cluster snapshots and database snapshots should be encrypted at rest

RDS.5.Title: RDS DB instances should be configured with multiple Availability Zones

RDS.6.Title: Enhanced monitoring should be configured for RDS DB instances

RDS.7.Title: RDS clusters should have deletion protection enabled

RDS.8.Title: RDS DB instances should have deletion protection enabled

Redshift.1.Title: Amazon Redshift clusters should prohibit public access

Redshift.2.Title: Connections to Amazon Redshift clusters should be encrypted in transit

Redshift.3.Title: Amazon Redshift clusters should have automatic snapshots enabled

Redshift.6.Title: Amazon Redshift should have automatic upgrades to major versions enabled

Redshift.7.Title: Redshift clusters should use enhanced VPC routing

S3.1.Title: S3 Block Public Access setting should be enabled

S3.2.Title: S3 buckets should prohibit public read access

S3.3.Title: S3 buckets should prohibit public write access

S3.4.Title: S3 buckets should have server-side encryption enabled

S3.5.Title: S3 buckets should require requests to use Secure Socket Layer

S3.6.Title: S3 permissions granted to other AWS accounts in bucket policies should be restricted

SNS.1.Title: SNS topics should be encrypted at-rest using AWS KMS

SSM.1.Title: EC2 instances should be managed by AWS Systems Manager

SSM.2.Title: EC2 instances managed by Systems Manager should have a patch compliance status of COMPLIANT after a patch installation

SSM.3.Title: EC2 instances managed by Systems Manager should have an association compliance status of COMPLIANT

SageMaker.1.Title: Amazon SageMaker notebook instances should not have direct internet access

SecretsManager.1.Title: Secrets Manager secrets should have automatic rotation enabled

SecretsManager.2.Title: Secrets Manager secrets configured with automatic rotation should rotate successfully

SecretsManager.4.Title: Secrets Manager secrets should be rotated within a specified number of days

WAF.1.Title: AWS WAF Classic Global Web ACL logging should be enabled
